statements: UPDATE environmental_impact_assessments SET project_name='Renewable Energy Project', location='California', assessment_date='2022-09-15', impact_description='Low environmental impact' WHERE assessment_id=1;

UPDATE environmental_impact_assessments SET location='New York', project_name='Urban Redevelopment Project', impact_description='Medium environmental impact', assessment_date='2022-10-20' WHERE assessment_id=2;
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessments SET project_name = 'Project ABC', location = 'City A' WHERE assessment_id = 1;
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessments SET impact_description = 'Significant impact on local flora and fauna', assessment_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE project_name = 'Project XYZ';
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessments SET project_name='New Project A' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE permit_requirements SET permit_description='Updated Permit Desc' WHERE project_id=2;
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessments SET location='City A', assessment_date='2023-05-10', project_name='Project Alpha' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE environmental_impact_assessments SET eia_location='Example Location 1' WHERE eia_id=1;
UPDATE compliance_records SET compliance_status='In Compliance', comments='Issue resolved' WHERE record_id=3;
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessments SET eia_location='New Location', eia_description='Updated description' WHERE eia_id=1;

UPDATE environmental_impact_assessment SET assessment_results = 'High impact' WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE permit_requirements SET issued_by = 'EPA', expiration_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE permit_id = 123;
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessment SET location='City A', assessment_results='Positive impact' WHERE author_name='John Doe';
UPDATE regulations SET description='Updated description', category='New category' WHERE regulation_id=101;
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessment SET project_name = 'New Project Name', assessment_date = '2022-10-20', assessed_by = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE environmental_impact_assessment SET location='New York', assessment_result='Approved' WHERE project_name='Project A';
UPDATE project_permits SET permit_date='2022-09-15' WHERE id=1;
